itemDescription: British military physician, former rugby union player for Scotland

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Iain Wainwright (born 22 March 1965) is a former rugby union footballer who was capped 37 times for Scotland (Captain 16 times) and once for the British and Irish Lions. He played flanker.

link_mentions.page: 1997 British Lions tour to South Africa
